messages.subject: Re: Hello Again
messages.msgSnippet: ... to ... for ... Try sasugabooks.com they are based in the USA. But if you want something that is entirely english and Shinsengumi... I think you have to
messages.messageBody:
--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "darkmalik" <jcolburn1@c...> wrote:
>
> I have only 10 minutes left till I have to get off so I would like
to
> ask if anyone knows where there are any books on the Shinsengumi
for
> sale, that are here in the U.S.?

Try sasugabooks.com they are based in the USA. But if you want
something that is entirely english and Shinsengumi... I think you
have to wait a month or two (or you can pre-order) Romulus
Hillsborough's Shinsengumi.

messages.subject: RE: [SHQ] Hello Again
messages.msgSnippet: In the Kinokuniya bookstore in New York, in the Sanseido bookstore in Edgewater, New Jersey, and in the BookOff store in New York. And also in more locations
messages.messageBody:
In the Kinokuniya bookstore in New York, in the Sanseido bookstore in
Edgewater, New Jersey, and in the BookOff store in New York. And also in
more locations on the West Coast.

--M.
